item.title: Intro to HPC
item.description: High performance computing is a way to process data much faster than a single computer possibly could. This is achieved by parallelizing code across a cluster of computer and nodes. Logging in Setting up VPN (if not on university premises) If you are not on university premises you will have to set up the University VPN. Setting up a connection on Linux can be done as follows: Go to https://uobnet2.
